description:
This pocket-sized mini pump has a built in Co2 inflator, giving you a safety net. For those days discovering new trails, bring this pump along and be ready for whatever they throw at you.

  • Dual chamber telescopic design maximizes volume for easy inflation up to 60 psi (4.1 bar)
  • Featuring quality aluminum construction with an ergonomic CNC-machined surface for added comfort
  • Dual head, one for Presta valves and the other for Co2
  • One 16g Co2 cartridge included
name: Cannondale Co2 Dirt Mini Pump
